Cosmos University: Crystals Databank

This Databank contains entries on one hundred and ninety-three crystals and lists their scientific, magical, ritualistic, and metaphysical propetries. This information is currently being gathered and updated as we accumulate it.

If you're interested in helping: We're facing a large backlog of scientific data that must be processed into these records. We are seeking additional sources on magical / spritual information.
